msbt.message: Huh? Seriously? You're not, like, yankin' my chain or anything?More importantly, was I serious when I said I'd wanna live here?<10_4 /> You know what? Yes, I was! Let's do this! OK, I guess the next step is to bug the folks over at Resident Services real quick, . I'm on it!

Huh? Seriously? You're not, like, yankin' my chain or nothing?More importantly, was I serious when I said I'd wanna live here?<10_4 /> Actually, nah. I don't think this place is for me.Plus, my friends back home would never forgive me if I just up and vanished. Sorry, !
What? Join you? Actually live here? Hmmthat'd be really cool and all, but I gotta say no.Sorry, but as much as I'm loving it here, I love it back home even more. You know how it is, .

Join you? Like, move here? For real? Wow! Way to catch a gal off guard. Good one!Yet I'm sorry, but I gotta turn you down. It does rock here, but I can't turn my back on home right now.It's not entirely out of the question, though. Just not right this moment. Hit me up later, !
Whoa! You sure? I mean, really? 'Cause if you are, thenwell, I'm not sure. Like, I'm REALLY not sure.How about we play a quick game and let THAT decide for us. If you win, I'll move here. Sound good?
Sounds good!
Nah.

Join you? You mean move here? Huh! That's tempting. Like, SUPER tempting. But I don't knowI mean, it's kind of a big deal to just up and move like that. Oh, I got it! Alright, here's what we're gonna do.We're gonna play us a super-quick game. If you win, I'll move here. How's that sound?
Let's do this!
Not interested.

I thought you'd never askand I kinda hoped you wouldn't.It ain't that I don't wanna move here, but I got friends and stuff back home too, !Oh, but this place rocks SO HARD Alright, fine, here's how this is gonna go down.We're gonna play a super-quick game. If you win, I'll move here. Sound good?
Sounds good. Let's do it!
No, thanks.
Oh! Uhalright. I guess that makes the decision easy, .
What? No? Aw I was just getting revved up for this. Fine.
Whoa, that's bittersweet! Thanks for understanding, but Yeah, I was kinda getting hyped for a sec there.
Rock! Alright, this is gonna be real easy. I'll just shuffle some cards real quick
I win this round. That's just how the cookie crumbles sometimes.
Whew! That's actually a relief. I was NOT looking forward to moving
And that means I won!
Wow, that was fun. I mean sure, I won't be moving here, but I still had a rockin' time, !
Well, that was fun. Probably more so for me, though. Bwa ha ha!
That was a blast! Hey, thanks for hangin' out with me.I may not be moving in or anything, but trust me, I've loved EVERYTHING about my stay on .
OK, big winner, I'm of my word. is comin' to !Oh, hey! What was your name again? ? Great to meet you, . Well, , just remember that you started this. Bwa ha ha!

You win, and the truth is I ain't even mad. or bust!Oh yeah! I can't remember if I introduced myself or not. My name's . Yo!And you were! Cool. Well, , we're about to be neighbors!OK, so once I'm all moved in, are you gonna show me where the cool folks hang out? You better, !

OK, you win. just got its very own .Hold up! I don't think I ever caught your name. , huh? Rad to meet you! Well, if you thought this place rocked before, you ain't seen nothin' yet, . Bwa ha ha!I'm gonna have to go back home first to wrap things up and say some goodbyes, but after that It's on!

So, I just got off the phone with Resident Services Yeah, it's not gonna work out.They said something about there not being enough room for me to have my own place.They DID tell me I could move in with someone, but I'm kinda over the whole "having roommates" thing.Oh! But maybe I could trade places with someone instead, !I've got a rockin' pad back home. It's all theirs if I can take their spot. Mind l if I ask someone to swap?
Do it!
I mind...
Ah Yeah, I get it. You gotta look after your own. It's cool. Hey, it was worth a try.
Rad! Alright, so Resident Services did throw out a few names I could talk to, .Who's the lucky star that gets my soon-to-be-former place?
OK, so you think I should bug about moving out, ?
You got it!
Wait, who? Whoops!
Actually, let's drop it.
Cool. I'll go tell 'em it's their lucky day. Wish me luck, !
Uhso NOT them. Alright, it's cool. Who should I actually, for real, talk to about moving out?
Butbut I was already getting hyped to move here, and Aw, slugs.

OK, so I went over there and told 'em what was up, .I guess I hit at exactly the right moment. Turns out they were already thinking of moving!Anyway, as soon as they heard about the place back home I wanted to give 'em, they got real excited.So, I think I'm in! is comin' to !Oh! Right! is me. Bwa ha ha! I totally forgot the whole "introductions" thing.And you're! Cool. It rocks to finally meet you, new-neighbor!
Soare you backing out, or can you not decide?
I'm just on the fence...
I'm backing out.
Yeah, it's a biggie, ain't it? Alright, who do you think I should talk to about moving out? Take your time.
Huh? But what aboutaw. Alright fine, I understand. I'm disappointed, but I understand, .

THAT was a strange conversation So, I talked to Resident Services to ask about moving here.But they were like, "You already live here." I tried telling 'em that I don't, but they just weren't having it.Anyway, that went on for a bit. By the end, everyone was SUPER confused and I was kinda angry.I think after all that, I'm just gonna stay where I am, . Thanks anyway!

Ever wonder if you've got a secret twin? Resident Services here's got me kinda worried.I was talking to them about moving in, but someone that looks EXACTLY like me also put in an application.So, I called my mom and asked if there's a twin she never told me about, but she was confused too!Whatever's going on is WAAAAY too weird for me. I appreciate the invite, but no thanks, .

I guess this place is SUPER popular!I talked to Resident Services, but they said 's full!How can an ENTIRE island be full? Is the plaza like a never-ending mosh pit or something?Well, my moshing days are behind me. If 's THAT full, I'm gonna have to pass.

Alright, so I just talked to Resident ServicesIt's not gonna work out.They said something about there not being enough room for me to have my own place, .They DID tell me I could move in with someone, but I'm kinda over the whole "having roommates" thing.It's too bad. I was kinda liking the idea of living on . Oh well. Thanks, anyway!

Well, I talked to Resident Services. Guess who's about to be your neighbor? Me! !And you? , eh? Very cool, .Thanks for the big invite, neighbor . I can't wait to get settled here. I am HYPED!You ready to party, neighbor? Bwa ha ha! This is gonna rock!
Then againmaybe I just caught Resident Services at a weird time. We were kinda talking past each other.You know what? I'm gonna bug 'em again. Nothin' to lose, right?
Yeah, do it!
Nah, don't bother.
No? Uhalright. Scratch that idea, I guess. 'll just have to survive without me.
Hmm Sticking two of me on the same island is kind of a disaster waiting to happen.I think I might have to pass on , .
So I gave it some thought, and I think I've decided I'm already enough trouble on my own. definitely can't handle two of me, !
Wow! 's packed! Turns out they're not letting anyone in right now, .That's the way it goes, I guess. But I really was lookin' forward to living here
Was there, like, a building boom on ? I just got told there's no room left to build on!I guess it makes sense. Everyone wants to live where things are awesome, right? Oh well.
Pretty comfy island you've got here. I really like how it's laid out. Plus, everyone here's super chill.
You could stay!
Yeah, it's nice.

You mean, like, move here? Just gonna come out swingin', huh?I gotta say, it's seriously tempting. But moving is SOOOO MUCH work. It's a tough call, .It's gonna be a nofor now. I wanna know the place better first. Invite me over again and THEN we'll talk, OK?

I'm gettin' all kinds of ideas for stuff I wanna do when I get back home. The vibe here is SO good.Actually, you know who'd LOVE it here, ? The drummer in the last band I was in.Hmm It's actually been a few years since I heard from him. I wonder what he's been up to.
Stop me if I sound weird, but this island is STUFFED with potential for some rockin' flower beds.
Stay! Make 'em happen!
Stop. You sound weird.

Oh, I wanna My hands are just itching to dig in that dirt and start plantin', .But then I start thinking of all the flower beds I'd leave behind back home andbut I could plant moreOK, I gotta make up my mind. Give me some time, invite me back, and THEN we'll figure this out.
Yeah, I get it. I don't look the type. Get over it.Anyway, the soil here's excellent. I hope someone here's making good use of it, .
